archimate:Contract.name: [Policy] Retention of L1 Files within the Data Backbone (Contract)
archimate:Contract.documentation:
The policy implements the DPDD for 30 day retention.
Some have noticed that these PVI's are the only processed images avaible until annula release. and shodl be retrined unt an PVI is supplanted via an annula realase. The thinking anto include some oft exposgures/images will never be processed in an annul realase becasue tthe exposures fail to ett quality ciuts. such PVIs woudl be retained for the life of the survey.
